item.title: Legal marijuana industry had banner year in 2018...
item.description:
www.yahoo.com
The last year was a 12-month champagne toast for the legal marijuana industry as the global market exploded and cannabis pushed its way further into the financial and cultural mainstream. Liberal California became the largest legal U.S. marketplace, conservative Utah and Oklahoma embraced medical marijuana

item.title: Musk argues pedophile accusation made on 'rough and tumble' TWITTER is protected speech...
item.description:
www.wsj.com
Elon Musk sought to dismiss a defamation lawsuit, with his lawyers arguing that no one could have taken seriously his claim that a British cave diver is a pedophile, especially because the statement was made in the “rough and tumble” forum of Twitter.

item.title: Bomb Explosion in Athens Fuels Fear of New Generation of Terror...
item.description:
www.wsj.com

item.title: STUDY: Surgeons Make Significantly More Mistakes When Under Stress...
item.description:
www.studyfinds.org
Surgeons under stress are far more likely to make mistakes on patients in the operating room, even if the stress is caused by a trivial source and lasts briefly, a Columbia University study finds.

item.title: Arab Spring 2.0? Tunisian journalist calls for revolt, sets self on fire...
item.description:
www.rt.com
A journalist in Tunisia – the first country to face the Arab Spring – has set himself on fire, triggering a protest against unemployment and poverty. The case resembles the start of the 2011 Western-hailed revolt.
